official_title: To authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel M/V SOUTH BASS.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue for a named vessel a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.

titles.title: To authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel M/V SOUTH BASS.
